info.title: P4Books ERP API
info.description:
## P4Books ERP System API Documentation

P4Books is a comprehensive ERP system providing:
- **Sales & Purchasing**: Quotes, Orders, Invoices, Bills
- **Inventory Management**: Receipts, Deliveries, Stock Control
- **Financial Accounting**: GL, Chart of Accounts, Posting Periods
- **Master Data**: Products, Customers, Vendors, Warehouses
- **Reporting**: Stimulsoft-based custom reports

### Authentication
Use the `ApiKey` header with your API key. The tenant is automatically determined from your API key.
